item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，摩根大通推出内部聊天机器人，作为基于人工智能的研究分析师
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，摩根大通已开始推出一款生成式人工智能（AI）产品，并告诉员工，其自有版本的 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 可以完成研究分析师的工作。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has begun rolling out a generative artificial intelligence (AI) product, telling employees that its own version of OpenAI's ChatGPT can do the work of a research analyst, the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 日本 6 月工业产值因汽车生产暂停而下降：路透调查
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，受部分汽车生产暂停的影响，日本 6 月份的工业产值可能出现下降，与上个月的增长势头相反。【原文：Japan's industrial output likely fell in June, reversing from gains made the previous month, led by suspension of some auto production, a Reuters poll found on Friday.】

item.title: 早间竞价疯狂一周后，股市更加坚挺
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 定时工作初创企业 Timee 在东京首次亮相，股价大涨 30
item.description: 初创公司 Timee 是一个将寻找兼职工作的工人与劳动力紧张的企业联系起来的平台，其股价周五在东京股市首次亮相就上涨了约 30%。【原文：Shares in startup Timee , which operates a platform connecting workers seeking side gigs with labour-strapped businesses, rose roughly 30% on Friday in their Tokyo stock market debut.】

item.title: 据韩国估计，朝鲜经济在经历多年萎缩后于 2023 年大幅增长
item.description: 据韩国央行估计，朝鲜经济在连续三年萎缩后，于 2023 年出现大幅增长，原因是 COVID-19 大流行病边境管制放松后，与中国的贸易额增加。【原文：North Korea's economy grew sharply in 2023 after shrinking for three straight years as trade with China increased after COVID-19 pandemic border controls were eased, according to estimates by South Korea's central bank.】

item.title: 狂野一周结束，日元持稳，亚洲股市疲软
item.description: 上周五，日元兑美元汇率在12周高点附近企稳，而亚太股市在经历了4月中旬以来最糟糕的一天交易后，依然表现低迷。【原文：The yen stabilized near a 12-week high against the dollar on Friday while Asia-Pacific equity markets remained on the back foot a day after their worst session since mid-April.】

item.title: 高盛称美国下任总统大幅增加 2025 年石油供应的手段有限
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周四表示，无论谁在 11 月的美国总统大选中获胜，明年大幅增加国内石油供应的手段都将十分有限。【原文：Goldman Sachs said on Thursday that whoever wins the U.S. presidential election in November will have limited tools to significantly boost domestic oil supply next year.】

item.title: 利差交易平仓，日元将迎来三个月来最强劲的一周
item.description: 周五，日元有望创下近三个月来最强劲的一周，因为在可能巩固降息预期的关键性美国通胀数据公布之前，交易商解除了长期以来对日元的押注。【原文：The yen was poised for its strongest week in nearly three months on Friday as traders unwound their long-held bets against the frail currency ahead of crucial U.S. inflation data that could cement rate cut expectations.】

item.title: 美国国内生产总值（GDP）数据强劲，石油价格上涨，但亚洲经济困境限制涨幅
item.description: 周五油价小幅上涨，原因是美国经济数据强于预期，提高了投资者对世界最大能源消费国原油需求增长的预期。【原文：Oil prices were up slightly on Friday on stronger-than-expected U.S. economic data that raised investor expectations for increasing crude oil demand from the world's largest energy consumer.】

item.title: 日本敦促二十国集团警惕外汇过度波动
item.description: 东京最高货币外交官神田正人（Masato Kanda）周四表示，日本已敦促二十国集团（G20）成员国对投机导致的过度汇率波动提高警惕。【原文：Japan has urged its G20 peers to be increasingly vigilant to excessive foreign exchange rate fluctuations driven by speculation, Tokyo's top currency diplomat Masato Kanda said on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本首都核心通胀率回升，需求驱动的价格增长疲软
item.description: 周五的数据显示，7月份日本首都的核心通胀率连续第三个月加速上升，但衡量需求驱动型物价增长的指数却有所放缓，这使得央行决定何时加息变得更加复杂。【原文：Core inflation in Japan's capital accelerated for a third straight month in July but an index gauging demand-driven price growth slowed, data showed on Friday, complicating the central bank's decision on how soon to raise interest rates.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 称超过 97% 的 Windows 传感器已恢复联机
item.description: CrowdStrike 公司首席执行官乔治-库尔茨（George Kurtz）周四表示，在该网络安全公司的一次软件更新引发全球网络中断近一周后，超过 97% 的 Windows 传感器已重新上线。【原文：More than 97% of Windows sensors are back online, CrowdStrike's CEO George Kurtz said on Thursday, nearly a week after a software update by the cybersecurity firm triggered a global outage.】

item.title: Dexcom 下调年度收入预期后股价暴跌
item.description: 医疗设备制造商 Dexcom 周四下调了年度营收预期，将原因归咎于销售团队重组、客户减少以及来自每个客户的营收降低，导致其股价在盘后交易中暴跌 40%。【原文：Medical device maker Dexcom cut its annual revenue forecast on Thursday, blaming a restructuring of its sales team, fewer customers, and lower revenue from each customer, sending its shares plummeting 40% in extended trading.】

item.title: KKR 拟以 48 亿美元将教育科技公司 Instructure 私有化
item.description: 私募股权公司 KKR & Co 周四表示，将以 48 亿美元的价格私有化教育软件平台 Instructure Holdings。【原文：KKR & Co will take education software platform Instructure Holdings private for $4.8 billion, the private equity firm said on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞价股市尝试复苏后仍未走出困境
item.description: Alden Bentley 在纽约对亚洲市场的未来一天进行了展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets by Alden Bentley in New York.】

item.title: 力拓、LG、比亚迪等公司对智利阿尔托安迪诺斯锂矿区感兴趣
item.description: 国营矿业公司ENAMI周四表示，力拓、比亚迪、LG能源、Eramet和Posco等12家公司提交了在智利阿尔托安迪诺斯盐滩开发锂项目的建议书。【原文：Rio Tinto , BYD , LG Energy , Eramet and Posco are among the 12 companies that submitted proposals to develop a lithium project in Chile's Altoandinos salt flats, the state-run mining company ENAMI said on Thursday.】

item.title: 全球局势紧张，L3Harris上调2024年展望
item.description: L3Harris 公司周四上调了 2024 年的业绩展望，第二季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，在全球安全担忧升级的情况下，该公司押注于持续的武器需求和强劲的国防开支。【原文：L3Harris raised its outlook for 2024 after beating Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, betting on sustained weapons demand and robust defense spending amid escalating global security concerns.】

item.title: 诺福克南方公司第二季度利润高于预期，原因是定价提高
item.description: 得益于强劲的定价能力，美国铁路运营商诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）公布的第二季度利润高于华尔街预期，使其股价周四上涨近 7%。【原文：U.S. railroad operator Norfolk Southern reported second-quarter profit above Wall Street estimates thanks to robust pricing, sending its shares up nearly 7% on Thursday.】

item.title: 史诗游戏公司称《堡垒之夜》将重返欧盟地区的 iOS 平台
item.description: 视频游戏公司 Epic Games 周四表示，其热门游戏《堡垒之夜》（Fortnite）即将重返欧盟的苹果 iOS 系统。【原文：Videogame company Epic Games said on Thursday its popular title "Fortnite" will be returning to Apple's iOS systems in the European Union soon.】

item.title: 因霍卡和 UGG 需求强劲，Deckers Outdoor 上调财年利润目标
item.description: 德克斯户外用品公司（Deckers Outdoor）周四上调了年度利润预期，此前该公司第一季度业绩超出预期，主要原因是鞋类和服装公司的 Hoka 运动鞋和 UGG 靴子需求强劲。【原文：Deckers Outdoor raised its annual profit forecast after beating first-quarter estimates on Thursday, betting on strong demand for the footwear and apparel firm's Hoka sneakers and UGG boots.】

item.title: 好莱坞电子游戏演员因人工智能和薪酬问题举行罢工
item.description: 视频游戏配音演员和动作捕捉演员因围绕人工智能相关工人保护的劳资合同谈判失败而举行罢工，导致好莱坞又一次停工。【原文：Videogame voice actors and motion-capture performers have called a strike over failed labor contract negotiations focused around AI-related protections for workers, bringing about another work stoppage in Hollywood.】

item.title: 嘉信理财任命 Michael Verdeschi 为首席财务官
item.description: 查尔斯-施瓦布（Charles Schwab）周四向美国证券监管机构提交的一份文件显示，经纪公司已任命迈克尔-韦德斯基（Michael Verdeschi）为首席财务官，自 10 月 1 日起生效。【原文：Brokerage firm Charles Schwab has appointed Michael Verdeschi as its chief financial officer, effective Oct. 1, according to a filing with the U.S. securities regulator on Thursday.】

item.title: 谷歌人工智能系统在数学推理方面取得进展
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周四发布了一对人工智能系统，展示了在解决复杂数学问题方面取得的进展，这是生成式人工智能发展的一个关键前沿领域。【原文：Alphabet's Google unveiled a pair of artificial intelligence systems on Thursday that demonstrated advances in solving complex mathematical problems, a key frontier of generative AI development.】

item.title: 巴西以对超级富豪征税为由对 G20 税务合作声明表示欢迎
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周四表示，二十国集团（G20）财政领导人准备批准一项关于国际税务合作的联合声明，以解决超级富豪征税等问题。【原文：Brazilian Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Thursday that G20 finance leaders were poised to endorse a joint declaration on international tax cooperation addressing issues such as the taxation of super-rich individuals.】

item.title: 美国加密货币交易所 Coinbase 新增三名董事会成员，其中包括 OpenAI 高管
item.description: 美国加密货币交易所 Coinbase 周四告诉路透社，该公司董事会新增了三名成员，其中包括来自 ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 的一名高管，因为该公司正在加大力度左右美国的加密货币政策。【原文：U.S. cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase has added three new members to its board of directors, including an executive from ChatGPT-maker OpenAI, as the company steps up its efforts to sway U.S. crypto policy, Coinbase told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 以科技股为主导的抛售推动 NDX 期权成交量创新高
item.description: 美国股市的大跌正在推动纳斯达克 100 指数的交易期权创下历史新高，因为科技股巨头的动荡打击了这一科技股重仓股。【原文：The selloff in U.S. stocks is driving record trading options on the Nasdaq 100 Index as the tech-heavy gauge is battered by turbulence in giant tech stocks.】

item.title: 喷气机制造工业问题给潮湿航展订单蒙上阴影
item.description: 周四，世界上最大的航空展落下帷幕，沙特新喷气式客机的可靠订单也未能驱散近期飞机生产无法快速满足需求的阴霾。【原文：The world's largest air show fizzled out on Thursday with a solid new Saudi jetliner order unable to dispel the gloom over recent problems in producing planes fast enough to meet demand.】

item.title: 阿克曼削减新基金目标规模，要求投资者做出承诺
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）表示，他在美国上市的新基金 Pershing Square USA 的规模将大大小于人们最初所说的 250 亿美元，理由是投资者对基金结构和如何投资现金普遍感到紧张。【原文：Bill Ackman said his new U.S. listed fund, Pershing Square USA, will be dramatically smaller than the $25 billion people initially said he could raise, citing investors' general nervousness about the structure and how to invest the cash.】

item.title: 对冲基金流动 摩根士丹利称宏观对冲基金将抛售 450 亿美元股票
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）周四在给机构客户的评论中说，计算机驱动的宏观对冲基金策略周三抛售了 200 亿美元的股票，在股市暴跌后的下周至少还将抛售 250 亿美元的股票，这是十年来最大的风险平仓事件之一。【原文：Computer-driven macro hedge fund strategies on Wednesday sold $20 billion in equities and are set to shed at least more $25 billion over the next week after the stock rout, in one of the largest risk-unwinding events in a decade, Morgan Stanley said in commentary to institutional clients on Thursday.】

item.title: 低成本航空公司 Flybondi 和 Jetsmart 瞄准巴西市场
item.description: 低成本航空公司 Flybondi 和 Jetsmart 的高管表示，未来几个月，这两家公司将把巴西作为首选飞行目的地，并希望随着市场的开放而扩大航线。【原文：Low-cost airlines Flybondi and Jetsmart are targeting Brazil as a top flight destination in coming months, looking to expand routes as the market opens up, executives at both firms said.】
